content.value:
Seeing how people reacted to the master branch renaming gives me no hope for tech making large-scale systemic change.

It takes such a fight to convince the people with power to do anything, and yet once they decide, action happens so quickly. Then they’re the heroes! 🤦🏼‍♀️
